alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 16 at 1:25AM MST until April 16 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST (12 PM to 9 PM MDT) THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Chinle Valley, Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM MST (12 PM to 9 PM MDT) this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust could also reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
